name: All Active Scholarships
query:
select pfc.scholarship, pfc.pf_student as student, pe.program  
from `tabPayers Fee Category PE` pfc, `tabProgram Enrollment` pe 
where pfc.pf_pe = pe.name and
pfc.pf_active = 1 and pfc.scholarship is not null and pfc.scholarship != '' order by pe.program, pfc.scholarship
